title: Project Overview
text: This RAG Chatbot demo showcases retrieval augmented generation using Next.js, Tailwind CDN, and the OpenAI API. It demonstrates embedding generation, cosine-similarity retrieval, and contextual answering.

title: How embedding works
text: Embeddings convert text into numeric vectors. Similarity between embeddings (via cosine similarity) is used to find the most relevant document chunks for a user's query.

title: Usage instructions
text: Ask questions about the project, e.g., 'How does the retrieval work?' or 'How to deploy this app to Vercel?'. The chatbot will include context from stored documents.
